message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that can bring significant value to your life. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value I'm looking to get out of it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $1200000. Considering its value to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1800000. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's worth to me, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value it can bring to you.
